catalog_info.title: Health Infrastructure Summary
catalog_info.description:
This dataset provides a summary of health infrastructure across various districts. It includes information on bed capacity, outpatient (OPD) visits, and the number of specialists available. 

**Technical Summary:**
*   **district:** Name of the district. May contain missing values.
*   **bed_capacity:** Total bed capacity in the district.
*   **opd_visits:** Number of outpatient visits recorded in the district.
*   **specialists:** Number of specialist doctors available in the district.

provenance.source: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare (Inferred)

spatial_temporal.spatial_coverage: Bhopal, Jaipur, Kota, Lucknow, Varanasi and other districts in India
